GoHighLevel Expertise: Become the go-to expert in the GoHighLevel platform, staying current with its features, updates, and best practices.

Campaign Development: Collaborate with clients to understand their marketing objectives and design comprehensive marketing campaigns within GoHighLevel.

Automation: Create and implement marketing automation workflows to streamline processes, enhance efficiency, and boost client ROI.

Lead Generation: Utilize GoHighLevel to build and manage lead generation funnels, including landing pages, forms, and integrations.

Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with industry trends, digital marketing strategies, and emerging technologies to enhance our services continually.

Strong knowledge of digital marketing, including
 marketing, SMS marketing, and social media marketing.

Excellent communication and client-facing skills.

Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.

Certifications or training in GoHighLevel are a plus.

Previous experience in a digital marketing agency is advantageous.

title: Senior TikTok Shop Affiliate Outreach Manager (US Market)
description:
[About the Role]

We are a premium K-Beauty brand specializing in professional aesthetic and anti-aging skincare (Wrinkle Tox 5D Shot). We are looking for a high-performing TikTok Shop Affiliate Outreach Manager to scale our US presence. The ideal candidate has a proven track record of identifying top-tier skincare influencers and driving significant revenue through strategic partnerships.



[Key Responsibilities]



- Massive Outreach & Discovery:** Identify and reach out to 2,000+ targeted skincare influencers per month.

- Precise Targeting:** Focus on influencers within the skincare/beauty niche who have generated over $5,000 in revenue in the last 30 days.

- End-to-End Communication:** Manage all communications via TikTok DM,
, and SNS. Craft personalized, high-converting invitation messages.

- Creative Guidance: Provide influencers with "Creative Hooks" and "Visual Guides" to ensure their content aligns with our premium aesthetic image and drives sales.

- Post Management: Monitor sample delivery, track upload status, and proactively encourage influencers to post high-quality content on time.

- Reporting: Maintain a daily/weekly tracker of outreach volume, response rates, and GMV performance.



[Qualifications]



- Experience:Minimum 1-2 years of direct experience in US TikTok Shop Affiliate management (Experience in the beauty/skincare industry is a huge plus).

- Full-Time Commitment: Ability to work 8 hours a day (aligned with US or KST time zone as discussed).

- Communication: Native-level written English with the ability to build rapport with influencers.

- Data-Driven: Proficient in TikTok analytics tools (e.g., KaloData, FastMoss, EchoTik).

- Proactive Attitude: A self-starter who doesn't just "send messages" but "closes deals" and drives revenue.



[Performance Bonus & Perks]



- Competitive base salary.

- Performance-based Incentives: Additional bonuses for reaching GMV targets and high-performing video uploads.

- Opportunity to lead our expansion into the Southeast Asian (SEA) TikTok Shops for top performers.

title: Senior Webflow Designer
description:
About the Project:



I am a UK-based HR and employment law consultant repositioning my boutique consultancy toward strategic advisory and board-level services. 



-This is not a startup brand. 

-This is not an e-commerce site. 

-This is a premium professional services website. 



The goal is a clean, intelligent, grounded, bilingual Webflow website using a purchased premium template (Nikka). 

You will not be building from scratch ‚Äî you will be refining and elevating. 



Scope of Work: 

-Customise purchased Webflow template 

-Implement brand colour system (dark-led, structured) 

-Apply typography (Exo + Montserrat) 

-Improve layout spacing and hierarchy 

-Advise on section structure where needed 

-Light copy refinement (clarity, grammar, tone polish) 

-Build structured bilingual setup (English + Greek path ‚Äì you don‚Äôt need to know Greek, don‚Äôt worry!) 

-Implement subtle motion/animations professionally 

-Add client logo carousel 

-Ensure full mobile optimisation 

-Apply basic technical SEO (meta titles, alt text, H1 structure) 

-Connect the domain and prepare for launch. 



This Is NOT For You If: 

-You mainly build Shopify or WordPress sites 

-Your portfolio is colourful, startup-heavy, or sales-funnel focused 

-You rely heavily on AI-generated content 

-You cannot show consultancy or professional services examples 

-You struggle with English nuance. 



This IS For You If: 

-You are strong in Webflow (5+ years minimum) 

-You understand premium professional service positioning 

-You have built sites for consultants, law firms, strategy firms, or advisory businesses 

-You care deeply about spacing, typography, and hierarchy 

-You can suggest improvements instead of just following instructions 

-You communicate clearly and professionally. 



Deliverables:

-Fully customised Webflow site 

-Clean and elegant execution 

-Desktop + tablet + mobile optimisation 

-Bilingual structure implemented properly (no Google Translate plugins) 

-Site ready for domain connection and launch. 



To Apply:

Please include: 

1. 3 Webflow sites you have built that are clean, minimal, and professional 

2. A short paragraph explaining how you would elevate a premium consultancy template 

3. Please include your hourly rate and fixed project estimate in your application. 



Applications without portfolio links will not be considered.  



Budget:

I am willing to pay above-average rates for strong Webflow expertise and clean execution. 

This is not a ‚Äúcheap build‚Äù project. Quality and attention to detail matter. 



In your application, include the word ‚ÄúStructure‚Äù at the top so I know you read the full description.

title: Full Time Business Development Representatives
description:
Enhesa, the leading provider of regulatory and sustainability intelligence worldwide are seeking two more motivated and results-driven Business Development Representatives from the Philippines to join their team. This role will focus on generating leads, building relationships, and driving growth through strategic outreach efforts. The successful candidates will play a critical role in the sales pipeline by identifying potential clients, initiating conversations, and setting up discovery calls to expand business opportunities.

Job Description:

- Utilize tools such as MS Dynamics CRM, Salesloft, Linkedin Sales Navigator, and Nooks or Aircall to research and engage prospects effectively

- Execute cold calling efforts to connect with potential leads and introduce our services

- Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to optimize outreach strategies and messaging

Qualifications

title: Short Term Rental Operation Manager
description:
Key Responsibilities

Guest Services & Communication

Manage guest messaging across all platforms (Airbnb, website, upcoming 
 listings).





Monitor guest communications during set shifts; help build toward 24/7 guest coverage as the team grows.





Coordinate pre-arrival information, door codes, check-out instructions, and upsell opportunities.





Respond to guest inquiries, issues, and reviews with professionalism and care.





Reservation & Channel Management

Use Cloudbeds to manage bookings, availability, and synchronized calendars across all OTAs.





Assist with onboarding new listings (VRBO, Expedia, etc.) and ensure brand consistency.





Track booking trends and guest data to inform marketing and pricing strategy.





Housekeeping & Maintenance Coordination

Manage cleaner and maintenance team schedules via Cloudbeds.





Oversee task checklists, unit inspections, and supply inventories.





Proactively communicate with on-site teams to ensure timely turnovers and issue resolution.





Financial Tracking

Input and categorize income and expenses using QuickBooks or equivalent.





Assist with vendor tickets, invoicing, and maintaining accurate financial records.





Marketing & Visibility

Monitor OTA performance and guest reviews to identify areas for improvement or promotional opportunities.





Coordinate group bookings (e.g., weddings, reunions, retreats) and guest upsell packages (e.g., spa or adventure bookings).





Provide strategic insights into guest behavior, trends, and operational performance.





Bonus: Marketing experience to increase both the quantity and quality of property visibility.







Preferred Qualifications

Experience: 2+ years in short-term rental or hotel virtual operations (Cloudbeds, Airbnb/VRBO required).





Skills: Fluent English, excellent communicator, tech-savvy, highly organized.





Bonus: Experience with QuickBooks, guest package creation, or Colorado tourism familiarity.





Extra Bonus: Marketing or digital ad experience for visibility and guest acquisition.

Collaborate closely with our regional teams to grow an exciting portfolio of leading Korean brands, including Beauty of Joseon, Needly, Tirtir, and other top-trending names in the market.

s

title: Transaction Coordinator - Real Estate| Full Time | 13month Bonus + Yearly Raises
description:
About Our Company:

The Growth Consultant is a leading business consulting company that helps entrepreneurs streamline operations, strengthen internal systems, and reduce daily workload so they can focus on growth and scaling. We support real estate professionals by providing reliable operational and administrative support that ensures transactions are handled accurately, efficiently, and in full compliance from contract to close.



Job Summary:

We are seeking a detail-oriented and highly organized Transaction Coordinator ‚Äì Real Estate to oversee all administrative, compliance, and documentation requirements throughout the lifecycle of real estate transactions. This role serves as the central point of coordination between agents, clients, lenders, inspectors, and escrow/title companies‚Äîensuring every file is complete, deadlines are met, and transactions progress smoothly to closing.



The ideal candidate has hands-on experience with real estate contracts, disclosures, and transaction workflows and is comfortable managing multiple transactions in a fast-paced, fully remote environment.



Key Responsibilities:



Transaction Management & Compliance

- Manage real estate transactions from executed contract through closing

- Prepare, review, and organize contracts, disclosures, addenda, and supporting documents

- Ensure all transaction files are accurate, complete, and compliant with brokerage policies and real estate regulations

- Track critical deadlines, contingencies, and milestones to prevent delays



Coordination & Communication

- Act as the primary liaison between real estate agents, clients, lenders, inspectors, and escrow/title companies

- Schedule inspections, appraisals, walkthroughs, and other transaction-related appointments

- Provide regular transaction status updates to agents and internal teams

- Proactively follow up on missing documents or outstanding items



Documentation & File Organization

- Maintain well-organized digital transaction files and records

- Upload, track, and manage signed documents and disclosures

- Ensure all required paperwork is completed and submitted on time



Qualifications:

- 2+ years of experience as a Transaction Coordinator or in real estate administrative support

- Strong knowledge of real estate contracts, disclosures, and compliance requirements

- Experience coordinating with lenders, escrow/title companies, and third-party vendors

- Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills

- Strong written and verbal English communication skills

- Ability to manage multiple transactions simultaneously in a deadline-driven environment

- Tech-savvy and comfortable using CRMs or transaction management systems

- Reliable internet connection and professional remote work setup



We Offer:

Fully remote position

13th-month pay

Annual salary increases

Supportive and collaborative team environment

Long-term growth opportunities within the company

title: Social Media Video Editor
description:
We do not evaluate candidates by years of experience. We evaluate by output.



We are looking for someone who can consistently produce high-quality, high-volume, performance-driven content across TikTok, X, Instagram, YouTube, and Reddit without sacrificing precision.



This role requires a deep understanding of native content mechanics and conversion-driven execution: 



- You understand that every platform operates differently

- You create platform-native content, not recycled edits

- You understand how hooks differ across short-form vertical, long-form horizontal, feeds and threads

- You know how to structure retention and increase watch time

- You know how to drive conversion to our website without sounding overly promotional



Native-first thinking is required.



You optimize continuously:



- Testing hooks

- Testing formats

- Testing video length

- Testing captions and thumbnails

- Iterating based on retention, CTR, engagement and conversion data.



You do not guess, you measure. You don't post and hope, but you refine and scale what works.



Your content must: 



- Capture attention within first two seconds

- Feel fully native to the platform

- Communicatie value clearly and efficiently

- Drive a strong and natural call to action



You understand exactly who you are creating for. You tailor messaging, pacing, references and tone to the viewers most likely to watch, engage and convert. You build for the right audience, not the broadest one.



We are looking for someone who treats content as a scalable growth system, not just creative output.



If you think in hooks, retention curves and conversion funnels, you will fit right in here.

title: Accountant with Australian experience / knowledge
description:
About the Role



We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Accountant to work for our team in Australia. The successful candidate will be responsible for preparing accurate financial reports, ensuring compliance with Australian taxation and statutory requirements, managing payroll, and overseeing debt collection processes.



This role requires strong technical knowledge of Australian accounting standards and tax regulations, along with excellent organisational and analytical skills.



Key Responsibilities



‚Ä¢ Prepare accurate monthly, quarterly and annual financial reports in accordance with Australian Accounting Standards

‚Ä¢ Prepare management reports, including profit & loss statements, balance sheets and cash flow statements

‚Ä¢ Prepare and lodge Business Activity Statements (BAS) and Instalment Activity Statements (IAS)

‚Ä¢ Manage and remit statutory obligations including:



o GST

o PAYG Withholding

o PAYG Instalments

o Superannuation Guarantee contributions

o Payroll Tax 

o Fringe Benefits Tax (FBT)

‚Ä¢ Ensure compliance with ATO and other regulatory requirements

‚Ä¢ Manage Single Touch Payroll (STP) reporting

‚Ä¢ Process and manage end-to-end payroll, ensuring accuracy and compliance

‚Ä¢ Oversee accounts receivable and lead debt collection activities, including following up overdue accounts

‚Ä¢ Perform bank and general ledger reconciliations

‚Ä¢ Assist with budgeting, forecasting and financial analysis

‚Ä¢ Support external auditors and liaise with tax advisors when required



Skills & Experience



‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Accounting

‚Ä¢ CPA or CA qualification (or working towards) preferred but not mandatory

‚Ä¢ Minimum of 2 years‚Äô experience in a similar accounting role in Australia

‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of Australian taxation laws and compliance requirements

‚Ä¢ Experience preparing and lodging BAS

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in accounting software , preferably MYOB, although we plan to move to XERO in the future

‚Ä¢ Advanced Microsoft Excel skills

‚Ä¢ High level of accuracy and attention to detail

‚Ä¢ Strong communication and problem-solving skills

‚Ä¢ Ability to meet deadlines and manage competing priorities



What We Offer



‚Ä¢ Competitive remuneration package including 13th month

‚Ä¢ Supportive and collaborative work environment

‚Ä¢ Opportunities for professional development and growth



You will be reporting to the CEO and will have external accounting advice and support from our external Tax accountant.

title: Admin Virtual Assistant
description:
Looking for a Rockstar General Admin Virtual Assistant for Ikoni Digital ????



???? Job Description



We're looking for a high-performing general administrative virtual assistant to help scale Ikoni Digital and keep our operations running smoothly.



You'll be the right hand to the founder, handling various administrative tasks that keep our lead generation agency organized and efficient. This role requires someone who can juggle multiple tasks, stay organized, and take initiative to improve our systems





? About Ikoni Digital



Ikoni Digital is a small B2B lead generation agency seeking for growth that helps its clients to generate leads using cold outbound. To grow to the next stage we need a highly motivated inbox manager who can provide great results and reduce my (Founder) workload.



We work with other B2B companies (mainly marketing agencies) and help them generate sales calls using cold outbound ‚Äì mostly with cold
. We have several clients in different industries and targeting different prospects. Your job is to communicate and schedule appointments with leads who have responded to cold
s we have sent on behalf of our clients.





???? What You‚Äôll Do



Your mission is simple: Respond to leads as fast as you can and schedule appointments



- Manage and organize client documents and files

- Data entry and CRM management (updating records, maintaining databases)

- Calendar management and scheduling coordination

- Create and maintain SOPs and process documentation

- Research tasks (finding tools, competitors, prospects, market data)

- Prepare reports and presentations

- Manage project tracking tools (Notion, ClickUp, or similar)

- Basic inbox management and
 organization

- Handle administrative communication with clients (Over Slack)

- Create and organize spreadsheets and databases

- Help with onboarding new clients (setting up folders, systems, documentation)

- Work directly with me (Founder) to improve our workflows and systems





???? The Dream Candidate:



This is an important role. You're the organizational backbone of the agency.





- Flawless written English

- Can follow instructions and checklists to a tee

- Is able to learn from both written SOPs and video recordings

- Comfortable with frequent communication with the team and clients

- Detail-oriented and ability to do similar tasks for a long period of time

- Proactive and able to spot inefficiencies and suggest improvements

- Tech-savvy and quick to learn new tools

- Some experience in general admin, virtual assistance, or operations support

- Bonus: Experience with tools like Clay, Make, Notion, CRM systems





? Must Requirements:



Don‚Äôt apply if you don‚Äôt have these.



- We'll communicate through Slack & Zoom. You must have access to a microphone and camera when you're at work

- Ability to work between 8am - 5pm Eastern Time (EST)

- Stable internet connection

- Comfortable learning and using various software tools





???? Hours



- Work time is between 8am ‚Äì 5pm EST

- Monday to Friday 4-8 hours per day

- We‚Äôll start with 1-2 month trial period, working 4 hours per day. After this, you should be able to work 6-8 hours per day

- We prefer to hire someone full-time



With this role, your time zone is US Eastern Time (EST)



This is important and you must be available between 8am ‚Äì 5pm EST. 



If you can‚Äôt do that, do not apply for this position





????Pay



This will depend on your level of skill and other people that apply for the job. But the range will be between $5 - $8 per hour.



If you perform well, we can provide more work and increase your rate.



We‚Äôll use time tracking software (Hubstaff) to calculate your hours and track your efficiency.





???? Why Join Us



- Work directly with an agency founder

- Opportunity to grow into more senior role as the company grows

- Learn the newest and best tech for cold
 & lead generation

- Gain experience in agency operations and systems building

- Coachable work environment





???? How to Apply



Make sure to follow these instructions exactly. They‚Äôre set up in a way that will filter out applicants that don‚Äôt follow them. I hope you‚Äôre not one of them :)



1. Start your application with ‚ÄúBrown Shorts‚Äù so we know you read this



2. Write 4-5 sentences on why you would like this position and what would make you a great fit.



3. Under your 4-5 sentences, answer the following questions and include the numbers to make it easy for me to read



1) What days and times are you available in Eastern Time (EST) ?

2) What‚Äôs your experience in general admin or virtual assistance?

3) What tools/software are you most comfortable with (CRM, spreadsheets, project management, etc.)?

4) Are you comfortable in frequent communication with me and clients in Slack?

5) Are you comfortable using a time-tracking software like Hubstaff?

6) Have you worked with very small companies (1-5) people before?

7) Do you have any experience in the cold
 / B2B lead generation space? If yes, tell me about it



Best of luck and hopefully we‚Äôll talk soon! ????



-Niko

title: Paid Media Buyer
description:
***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***



Job Title: Paid Media Buyer

Location: Remote | Philippines based ONLY

Salary: Php 100,000 - Php 120,000 / month (negotiable depending on experience)



We‚Äôre looking for experienced paid media buyers to manage and scale lead generation campaigns across Reddit, X 
), and Snapchat. You don't need experience in all 3 to apply, we are happy for a person to just manage 1 channel if that is where their expertise lie.



This is NOT organic social. We are strictly hiring buyers with hands-on experience running paid ads, optimising funnels, and scaling spend profitably.



Responsibilities

Plan, launch, and manage paid advertising campaigns on Reddit, X, and/or Snapchat

Optimise for lead generation and further down the funnel

Test and iterate on ad creatives, copy, audiences, and bidding strategies

Work with our internal team at the agency and you will have access to designers and UGC creators.

Scale campaigns responsibly while maintaining performance

Monitor performance daily and make data-driven optimisations

Provide clear reporting and insights on campaign performance



Requirements

Proven experience running paid ads on Reddit, X, or Snapchat

Demonstrated success with lead generation campaigns

Experience managing meaningful ad spend (please specify budgets managed)

Strong understanding of tracking, attribution, and optimisation

Comfortable testing aggressively and scaling winners

Familiarity with regulated or sensitive niches is a plus (claims, finance, insurance, legal, etc.)



Nice to Have

Experience in the claims, insurance, legal, or finance verticals

Ability to handle large budgets and rapid scaling

Creative testing frameworks and structured experimentation processes

Experience working with compliance









***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***



How to Apply:

To apply for this role, please submit a link to your resume and a brief Loom video (1-2 minutes) introducing yourself and highlighting your skills relevant to the role. In your video, please address the following:

- Platforms you‚Äôve actively run paid ads on (Reddit, X, Snapchat)

- Examples of lead gen campaigns you‚Äôve managed

- Typical monthly ad budgets you‚Äôve handled

- Any experience in the claims or regulated spaces

title: Landing Page Builder (GemPages, Shopify) for E-commerce Brand
description:
We are an ambitious and fast-growing e-commerce brand focused on scaling our online presence through high-converting landing pages. As we expand our advertising efforts, we are looking for a skilled and creative Landing Page Builder who specializes in Shopify and GemPages to join our team.



Our marketing strategy relies heavily on optimized landing pages designed to convert visitors into customers. We need someone who not only knows how to use GemPages inside Shopify but also understands conversion-focused design, user experience, and responsive layouts.



You will be responsible for building visually appealing, high-converting landing pages that look excellent on both desktop and mobile devices. This role requires someone detail-oriented who can follow brand guidelines while also bringing creative ideas to improve performance.



We are particularly interested in candidates who already have hands-on experience with GemPages and can deliver ready-to-publish pages efficiently.



Key Responsibilities:



Building high-converting landing pages using GemPages in Shopify



Ensuring all pages are fully optimized for both mobile and desktop



Implementing clean, visually appealing layouts aligned with our brand



Optimizing page structure for conversions (clear sections, CTA placement, etc.)



Collaborating with our team to refine designs and messaging



Delivering completed landing pages in a timely manner



Qualifications & Skills:



Proven experience using GemPages within Shopify



Strong understanding of conversion-focused landing page design



Ability to create responsive designs that look great on all devices



Attention to detail and ability to follow brand guidelines



Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines



Experience with e-commerce brands is a strong plus



Compensation:



$50 per completed landing page



Application Process:



To ensure you have read this listing carefully, please begin your application with the phrase:



‚ÄúI design landing pages.‚Äù



In your application, please include:



Your experience using GemPages and Shopify



A portfolio or links to landing pages you have created previously



Your availability and how quickly you can start



Why you believe you are a good fit for this role



This is a remote position with flexible hours. We are looking for a reliable specialist who can consistently deliver high-quality landing pages as we continue to grow.



Apply now to join our team and help us build landing pages that convert.

title: Client Delivery Ops Coordinator (Property) - UK Afternoons (Part-Time) (Chasing + Podio + Finance)
description:
CLIENT DELIVERY OPS COORDINATOR (PROPERTY) - UK HOURS (PART-TIME)

CHASING + PODIO + FINANCE



We‚Äôre Total Property Group - calm operators delivering world-class property deals, minus the chaos.



Tired of ‚ÄúVA roles‚Äù that are really vague inbox firefighting with no structure, no standards, and no support? Same. We built TPG to be the opposite.



If you‚Äôre stuck in a role where everything is urgent, nothing is clear, and you‚Äôre blamed for the mess, you‚Äôll like it here. We run clean systems, set clear priorities, and trust good people to own outcomes.



We‚Äôre a fast-paced UK property investment company helping hands-off investors buy boring, predictable Liverpool buy-to-lets - fully hands-free.



This is not a generic VA role. It is hands-on operations, delivery admin, confident chasing, and set routines.





ABOUT US



We‚Äôve helped investors secure over ¬£10m in Liverpool buy-to-let deals and built a 5-star client reputation through calm, consistent delivery.



We were Highly Commended - Property Investment Company of the Year 2024 and 2025 (two years running).



We‚Äôre high standards and calm by design. No drama. Just delivery.





WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL ACTUALLY DO



You‚Äôll support our Operations & Executive Assistant and keep deals moving day-to-day, while running key finance admin routines that protect rent, cashflow, and clean records.





CLIENT DELIVERY ADMIN



You‚Äôll:



- Run Day 0 onboarding (WhatsApp group, onboarding messages, folders, Podio setup)

- Keep live deals moving in Podio (tasks, statuses, dates, docs, next actions)

- Chase solicitors, agents, brokers, letting agents, and suppliers - and log outcomes

- Handle insurance and survey admin (quotes, reminders, tracking)

- Upload and organise key documents and safety certificates

- Manage viewing media (upload, name correctly, send Key Pickup + Mid-Project updates using templates)

- Support lettings handover admin (listing link, tracking to tenant, compliance admin)

- Turn delivery-critical
s into clear Podio tasks

- Spot gaps and suggest improvements (we love operators)





FINANCE ADMIN ROUTINES (FIXED BLOCKS)



You‚Äôll:



- Mon + Thu: lettings tally check and update (verify rent, flag exceptions same day)

- Tues + Fri: check and load supplier invoices for payment

- Fri: Stripe + bank payment checks and Podio updates

- 1st-3rd working day: month-end close tasks (including requesting 2FA early where needed)

- Hubdoc receipts/invoices, MileIQ reporting, bookkeeping support





HOURS, SCHEDULE, AND LOCATION



- Remote (any country)

- 20-25 hours per week, Monday to Friday

- Must cover UK afternoons: typically 12:00-17:00 (UK time). Exact hours agreed during onboarding.

- Training: for the first 2-4 weeks, you may need to start earlier on some days to attend training sessions.

- Start date: ASAP

- Website: search ‚ÄúTotal Property Group Liverpool UK‚Äù





WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL NEED TO SUCCEED



- Written and spoken English must be highly fluent for this role

- Experience: 1+ year in operations/admin or client delivery (remote), with confident chasing and CRM/task tool use

- Ops/admin experience where accuracy and follow-through matter

- Confident chasing third parties, calm and professional

- Strong written and spoken English

- High attention to detail (files, dates, templates, CRM hygiene)

- Comfortable following SOPs and spotting issues early

- CRM/task tool experience (Podio is a big plus)

- Reliable internet and a distraction-free home setup

- Tools you‚Äôll use: Podio, Google Drive/Sheets, WhatsApp Web, Stripe, Hubdoc, MileIQ



Bonus points for UK property admin exposure, invoicing, receipts, or basic finance routines.





HOW YOU THINK MATTERS MORE THAN YOUR CV



You‚Äôll thrive here if you:



- Take ownership - you don‚Äôt need chasing

- Follow through - you close loops and log outcomes

- Stay organised - SOPs, checklists, clean updates

- Sweat the details - accuracy matters here

- Communicate calmly - clear, professional messages





THE DETAILS



Title: Client Delivery Operations Assistant (Property)

Remote position

Hours: 20-25 hours/week (Mon-Fri)

Schedule: UK afternoons (typically 12:00 to 17:00 UK time)

Contract: Independent contractor (hourly)

Pay: $7.00-$9.00/hour (based on demonstrated reliability and experience)

Paid time off (holiday): 12 paid days/year, accrued at 1 day per month worked

Growth: More hours and responsibility available for the right person as we grow

Start date: ASAP





A NOTE FROM PAT (FOUNDER)



‚ÄúThis is a high-trust role. We need someone steady and world-class who keeps delivery clean, chases confidently, and runs the routines properly so clients feel looked after without chaos. If you like structure and ownership, you‚Äôll do very well here.‚Äù



We‚Äôre hiring one person for this seat. If you‚Äôre reading this and thinking ‚Äúthis sounds like me‚Äù, apply now.





NEXT STEPS



1) Take the Wealth Dynamics / Genius U Test:



(Save your full report - you‚Äôll need it later.)



2) Prepare these 3 documents:

- Your CV

- A short covering letter

- Your Wealth Dynamics / Genius U profile report





COVER LETTER GUIDELINES



Keep it short and human. Tell us:



- Why this role excites you (delivery ops, chasing, tidy systems)

- One example that proves you‚Äôre reliable under pressure

- How you stay organised and accurate (SOPs/checklists, clean CRM updates)





APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS



Complete our online application form:

- Upload all 3 documents at the bottom of the form

- Bonus: if you‚Äôve read this far, when asked your favourite colour in the form, choose ‚Äúolive.‚Äù



We‚Äôre reviewing applications as they come in.



APPLY HERE:

title: Accountant (Multi-Entity)
description:
Role Purpose

To manage the daily accounting function across multiple TBD entities, ensuring invoices are processed, payments are collected, accounts are reconciled, and financial statements are prepared accurately and on time.

The Arrangement

This is a results-based engagement, not an hours-based one. The work needs to be completed each morning once Xero has updated overnight. As long as the work is done and I can see results, the exact timing within the morning window is flexible.

‚Ä¢Service window: 8:00am - 10:00am AEST (approximate)

‚Ä¢Flexibility within that window based on workload

‚Ä¢What matters: work is complete, accurate, and I can see the results

‚Ä¢No micromanagement of hours if outcomes are delivered



Primary Values



Highest Standards : Every figure is correct. Every reconciliation balances. Every statement is accurate. No sloppy work, no assumptions, no 'it's probably right'.



Ownership: You own the numbers. If something doesn't balance, you find out why. If a payment is missing, you chase it. You don't wait to be told there's a problem.



Deliver Results:  The work gets done every morning. Reports are ready when needed. Queries are resolved, not parked. Outcomes matter more than hours logged.





1 Accounts Receivable Generate and send all client invoices across multiple entities via Xero. Ensure accuracy of amounts, services, and client details. Chase overdue payments.

2 Accounts Payable Process supplier invoices, verify against purchase orders or approvals, schedule payments, and maintain accurate creditor records.

3 Debt Collection Actively chase outstanding debts. Request and follow up on statements. Resolve queries promptly. Escalate aged debt as per agreed thresholds.

4 Bank Reconciliation Reconcile all bank accounts daily once Xero updates. Identify and resolve discrepancies. No unmatched transactions left unaddressed.

5 Multi-Entity Management Manage accounts across Australian and UAE entities. Maintain clean separation between entities. Ensure intercompany transactions are properly recorded.

6 Statement Requests Request statements from suppliers and debtors as needed. Confirm balances. Identify and resolve any discrepancies between records.

7 Query Resolution Respond to and resolve queries from clients, suppliers, and internal stakeholders. Don't let queries sit. Own them until resolved.

8 Financial Statements Prepare monthly Profit & Loss and Balance Sheet for each entity. Ensure statements are accurate, complete, and delivered by agreed deadlines.

9 Month-End Close Complete month-end close procedures. Ensure all transactions are posted, accruals are recorded, and accounts are ready for reporting.



Requirements

Essential

‚Ä¢Strong Xero experience (this is non-negotiable)

‚Ä¢Experience managing accounts for multiple entities

‚Ä¢Ability to prepare financial statements (P&L, Balance Sheet)

‚Ä¢Experience with accounts receivable, accounts payable, and bank reconciliation

‚Ä¢Comfortable chasing payments and resolving queries professionally

‚Ä¢Reliable internet and quiet workspace

‚Ä¢Available within the 8:00am - 10:00am AEST service window

Desirable

‚Ä¢Accounting qualification (CPA, CA, or equivalent)

‚Ä¢Experience with Australian accounting standards (UAE experience a plus)

‚Ä¢Experience in a services or professional services business

What Success Looks Like

‚Ä¢Bank accounts reconciled daily, no unexplained items

‚Ä¢Invoices sent on time and accurately

‚Ä¢Debts chased proactively, not aged silently

‚Ä¢Queries resolved, not parked

‚Ä¢Financial statements ready when needed, accurate and complete

‚Ä¢I can see results each morning without having to ask

‚Ä¢Problems flagged early, not discovered later

The Non-Negotiables

‚Ä¢Accuracy is everything. If you're not sure, check. If you can't check, ask.

‚Ä¢Don't let things age silently. If a debt is overdue, chase it. If a query is unresolved, resolve it.

‚Ä¢Own your numbers. If something doesn't balance, it's your job to find out why.

‚Ä¢Communicate proactively. If there's a problem, I should hear it from you first.

‚Ä¢Results matter more than hours. Get the work done right, and the flexibility works both ways.

title: Amazon Private Label and PPC Specialist
description:
About the role

We are an Australian owned business with a UK based private label brand on Amazon.

You will be managing a UK marketplace private label brand for an Australian client.

We are looking for an experienced Amazon specialist in the Philippines to manage our advertising campaigns, support A plus content, and stay on top of performance every week. You will work closely with our creative team to brief and improve images and video so the brand stays competitive and profitable.



Key responsibilities

1. Campaign and ad management

Set up, manage, and optimise Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display campaigns.

Monitor Amazon Ads and Ad Console several times per week within your agreed hours.

Adjust bids, budgets, and targeting to reach ACOS and TACOS targets.

Manage keyword research, search term reports, and negative keywords.

Run regular tests on creatives, headlines, and placements.

2. Private label brand management

Work only on our private label listings, not arbitrage or wholesale.

Review competitor listings, pricing, and offers on the UK marketplace.

Suggest changes to offers, pricing, and promotions based on data.

Coordinate with the team on review strategy and listing quality.

3. A plus content and listings

Review current listings and A plus content for clarity, keyword coverage, and conversion.

Brief the creative team on images, infographics, comparison charts, and brand story modules.

Check uploads on Amazon once the creative team delivers the assets.

Suggest ongoing improvements based on performance data.

4. Creative and video ads

Plan what image and video assets are needed for ads and product detail pages.

Provide clear briefs to designers and video editors with examples and references.

Review final assets before upload and confirm they meet Amazon guidelines.

Monitor performance of video ads and propose changes when needed.

5. Reporting and optimisation

Prepare a short weekly performance summary with key numbers, including ACOS, TACOS, ad spend, sales, best and worst performers, and search terms.

Flag any issues early, including sudden drops in performance or policy warnings.

Keep simple dashboards or spreadsheets up to date.



Skills and experience

Strong experience managing Amazon Ads for private label brands, with at least one year of hands on experience in Amazon PPC and Ad Console.

Confident in managing Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display.

Confident in keyword research and search term analysis.

Experience with bid and budget optimisation and negative keyword strategy.

Good understanding of listing optimisation, including titles, bullet points, images, and A plus content.

Experience working with a creative team and giving clear, structured briefs.

Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills for basic reports and analysis.

Experience with tools such as Helium 10, Jungle Scout, Data Dive, or similar.

Strong English reading and writing skills, with a focus on UK marketplace wording.

Personal qualities

Proactive and organised, always aware of campaign performance.

Detail focused, especially with numbers, bids, and budgets.

Comfortable working independently with light supervision.

Clear and direct communicator, able to explain needs and findings to the creative and leadership team.

Strong sense of ownership for results and ad spend.



Hours and working pattern

Approximately 3 to 5 hours per week to start.

Flexible schedule, as long as agreed weekly tasks and reporting are completed on time.

Potential for more hours as the brand grows and results improve.

Benefits

Work from home, long term role for the right person.

Stable client based in Australia with growth plans in the UK marketplace.

Opportunity to grow hours and responsibilities over time.

title: Web Visibility and SEO Operations Specialist (GoHighLevel and WordPress)
description:
Location :  Philippines remote

Pay:  AUD 7 to AUD 10 per hour

Hours :   Flexible schedule with logged hours

Some overlap with Australia and UK time zones as needed



Team and reporting

 Part of the Online and Creative Team

 Direct reporting to CEO for weekly updates, issues, recommendations, and priorities

 Work on Teams By Design assets and, when directed, client websites and profiles

Role purpose

 Own search visibility and website operations.

 You will ensure our websites are crawled, indexed, and presented correctly across Google, Bing, and AI driven search experiences.

 You will manage the technical foundations behind visibility: sitemaps, metadata, structured data, site architecture, redirects, indexing controls, and tracking.

 You will also tell the team what content inputs you xing

 Maintain XML sitemaps, robots rules, canonical tags, redirectneed from blogs and video so our site stays current and trusted.

Key responsibilities

 Search visibility operations

 Manage Google Search Console and fix indexing and crawl issues

 Set up and manage Bing Webmaster Tools and monitor indes, and noindex rules

 Improve site structure and internal linking to support crawling and rankings

 Identify and remove duplicate or thin pages from indexing pathways



AI search readiness

 Structure pages so AI tools extract accurate answers

 Implement structured data such as Organisation, LocalBusiness, Service, FAQ, Article, Breadcrumb

 Maintain and improve Source of Truth pages and keep them current

 Monitor how our content appears in AI results and recommend improvements











GoHighLevel build and optimisation

 Build and maintain pages in GoHighLevel including service pages, landing pages, and funnels

 Set page level SEO fields including titles, descriptions, and indexing settings

 Ensure mobile responsiveness and clean user experience

 Support conversion tracking for key forms and funnels



WordPress support

 Maintain WordPress sites as required including updates, backups, plugins, and troubleshooting

 Implement SEO improvements inside WordPress when directed

Google Business and Google Workspace

 Support Google Business Profile optimisation and consistency of business information

 Support Google Workspace fundamentals including domain and
 setup basics such as SPF, DKIM, DMARC

Tracking and reporting

 Maintain analytics and tracking across websites and funnels

 Send a weekly update to CEO covering:

 What changed

 What broke or is at risk

 What improved

 Your recommendations and next priorities

 What you need from the team to execute

Content input planning

 Define what blog and video inputs are needed to support search and keep pages current

 Create content briefs focused on search intent, internal linking, and page structure

 Ensure each new blog or video page has correct metadata, schema, and internal links



Required experience

 Hands on GoHighLevel website and funnel experience

 Strong technical SEO fundamentals: sitemap, robots, canonical, redirects, noindex

 Confident using Google Search Console to diagnose and fix indexing problems

 Experience using Bing Webmaster Tools

 Understanding of metadata, on page SEO, and structured data schema

 WordPress maintenance experience

 Basic HTML and CSS troubleshooting

 Strong written English and clear reporting



Nice to have

 Google Tag Manager and event tracking setup

 Page speed and Core Web Vitals improvement work

 Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimisation

 Automation tools such as Make, Zapier, n8n

 Experience creating SOPs for repeatable web operations



Non negotiables

 You log your hours and deliverables clearly

 You raise issues early with evidence and a recommendation

 You document your work and build SOPs

 You focus on outcomes, not activity

How we will assess you

 Short technical interview

 Practical test using our live website:

 Identify what is wrong in a sitemap when it throws an XML parse error

 Explain how you would fix indexing and duplicate URL issues

 Provide recommendations for one service page including metadata and internal links

 Provide a sample weekly report update format

title: CINEMATIC REEL EDITOR (Da vinci resolve) !!
description:
Please do not apply unless you consider your edits to be truly EPIC! Experienced editors with good taste only please!



If you really want to speed up the process and are prepared to do a trial edit, select one of the 3 editing types below, I will provide you some clips, and you can spend 30 minutes to create a short reel.

- Or, even better - just take a couple of reels off my instagram, make a creative 15s edit. Impress me, instead of just sending another ChatGPT message with a portfolio link ;)



I need an epic short form editor to join my team! Currently it's me doing everything - i am running a video business, i do all the filming, finding clients from various niches, but I need a solid editor for on-going employment as I continue to grow. Currently the number of clients coming in is way more than I can handle, and I'm just getting started. I plan to build a team of 3-4 full time editors over the coming 6 months



There is a wide variety of edits I will need help with, including: engaging podcast edits, cinematic montages, fast paced ADs, funny skits. It is not necessary that you are great at everything - but being a master of 1 or 2 styles is helpful as I continue to hire more editors.



It is ideal if you use Da vinci resolve, but if you are good at what you do then any software will be fine. Ultimately I will be hiring many editors and I will help maintain the quality control over everything! My clients love me for my filming & editing style - I am always trying to improve and push the boundaries of how we tell stories with visuals - anyone joining my team must be serious about becoming a truly great editor!



Your role will be to help me produce a higher volume of quality content for a wide range of clients. Saving me time in my own editing process. Also helping me create BTS reels and all sorts of things, but I will rather learn where your skills are best and give you more work there.



As for how to test applicants, there will be a first interview. Then, you will create 4 reels in 4 hours. This will be a paid trial. 



- 1 hour: a 'cinematic montage' reel - 10-15s

This is a fast-paced dynamic edit using my camera clips, visual & musical, 10-15seconds length. But don't just choose cool clips, tell a story with the order of the clips. You have one hour to create a scroll stopping, visually engaging short reel that makes people want to watch again. Make it pop with a few sound effects as well!



- 1 hour: a 'story' reel: 30s

I provide a 30 second interview snippet (that I have already edited the pacing of) and b-roll clips, you will place the clips to help tell the story that is being spoken. You have one hour to create as much emotional impact with the clip selection with the story. This isn't about fancy effects - this is about carefully choosing the right camera clips, matching the action, emotional impact of the clips, zooms and crops to make the footage flow smoothly. Cinematic bro. Haha



- 1 hour: a 'podcast' reel - 1:30-2 mins

I provide a podcast clip (usually 1:30-2 mins in length) that I have already edited for pacing. You will edit over the top, adding engaging visuals that compliment the conversation. You have one hour to take my initial podcast edit, and give it an engaging & complimentary visual experience. Aim for roughly 60/40: 60% of the time the conversation is on the screen, and 40% cutting away to other clips and visuals. Be a bit creative here...



- 1 hour: 'wildcard' reel - 30s

Make whatever you want, just make it cool! Use camera clips from a shoot to make one reel. 30s



Now, this of course isn't enough time to make the best reels in the world! this is just for me to see how well you can work with timeframes, as we are creating such a high volume of reels we need to have predictable systems to know how long a job will take. For example, I know that on average it takes me about 10 hours to edit 15 reels for some of my client packages. We will have to be flexible with timeframes, as different clients will be paying more for higher quality reels - those will require more effort. Sometimes we are provided 20+ reels to a client at a lower price, these must be completed in less time! In these cases, its more about having good taste than just mindless editing.



Check out some of my work on

title: HighLevel CRM Tech Specialist
description:
JOB OVERVIEW



Sell More Homes | Tech Specialist | Full-Time



Sell More Homes is a 7-figure marketing and coaching company that helps real estate agents across North America systemize their businesses, and close more deals using Meta/YouTube ads, HighLevel CRM, AI, and virtual assistants.



We‚Äôre looking for a Tech Specialist to join our winning team! If you're a pro at marketing tech, CRM systems, and love helping others succeed, this role might be for you.



What You‚Äôll Do:



Onboard New Clients:

Serve as the first tech touchpoint for new clients. You'll walk them through onboarding sessions, help them set up or connect their Meta 
) ad accounts and HighLevel CRM.



CRM Setup:

Set up and customize HighLevel CRM accounts for new clients ‚Äì including pipelines, automations, integrations, workflows, and more.



Support & Troubleshooting:

Provide tech guidance, answer client questions about tools and integrations, and troubleshoot setup issues as needed.



---



What We‚Äôre Looking For:



* Proven experience with marketing platforms (especially Meta Ads and GoHighLevel CRM)

* Comfortable guiding non-technical clients through tech setup

* Excellent communication, organization, and follow-through

* A proactive team player who can manage multiple onboarding clients at once

* Detail-oriented and process-driven

* Fast learner who thrives in a fast-paced, evolving environment

* Bonus: experience in real estate, digital marketing, or SaaS onboarding



---



Why Join Sell More Homes?



* Play a vital role in a fast-growing, impact-driven company

* Learn directly from a high-performing team and visionary founder

* Be part of a real estate marketing agency that recently earned HighLevel Gold SaaS status (2024) ‚Äì and we‚Äôre aiming for Platinum in 2025

* Opportunity to grow into operations, client success, or product roles

* Work with passionate real estate professionals across North America

* 100% remote



---



Apply now and help shape the future of real estate in North America

title: Executive Assistant ‚Äî Operations & Recruitment
description:
Talentport (Hiring on behalf of a client)

Remote | Full-Time



About the Opportunity

Talentport is recruiting an experienced Executive Assistant on behalf of a growing business client seeking high-level operational support. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in structured environments, enjoys building systems, and takes ownership of keeping operations running smoothly.



You‚Äôll work closely with leadership to support recruitment, administration, documentation, and accountability processes helping ensure the business operates efficiently and professionally. If you are looking to join a caring, growth-oriented environment where initiative is valued, this is an excellent opportunity.



Role Overview

The Executive Assistant serves as a key operational support partner to leadership. You will coordinate recruitment processes, manage documentation, support internal accountability systems, and ensure communication and reporting workflows stay organised. This role requires someone proactive, detail-driven, and comfortable working independently while supporting a fast-moving team.



Key Responsibilities

- Recruitment & HR Support

- Coordinate candidate sourcing and recruitment workflows

- Draft interview communications and scheduling

- Conduct preliminary screening interviews when required

- Maintain hiring records and documentation

- Administrative & Documentation

- Draft contracts, letters, and operational documents

- Organise and maintain digital filing systems

- Prepare performance and operational reports

- Manage
 correspondence and follow-ups

- Accountability & Operations

- Track staff attendance and activity reporting

- Maintain accountability and reporting systems

- Follow established SOPs with consistency

- Identify workflow gaps and develop SOPs where needed

- Communication & Coordination

- Liaise with internal tea
mbers to track deliverables

- Support leadership with project follow-ups

- Prepare summaries and internal updates



Required Skills & Tools

- Strong proficiency in Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, Gmail)

- Ability to structure spreadsheets and reports

- Canva or equivalent document formatting skills

- Excellent written communication

- Strong organizational and time-management abilities

- Comfortable working within structured processes



What We‚Äôre Looking For

- High initiative, proactive problem-solving mindset

- Detail-oriented and reliable execution

- Systems thinker who enjoys improving workflows

- Independent worker with strong accountability

- Professional communicator

- Growth-focused mindset



Why This Role

- Work within a supportive, growth-driven environment

- Exposure to recruitment and operational leadership

description:
Cloudberries is a fast-growing DTC puzzle brand with a loyal global customer base. We‚Äôre looking for a senior customer service operator who is genuinely expert in Gorgias and Shopify, and who can improve how we do things ‚Äì not just follow instructions.

Nice to have:

 the subject line of the
, include only the free-shipping threshold for EU orders shown on our website (digits only, nothing else). The body of your message should say: I‚Äôm the missing piece!

s are welcome at

title: Amazon Brand Manager & Brand Manager Intern
description:
AMAZON BRAND MANAGER



We are looking for a talented and versatile Amazon Brand Manager! If you think that you have what it takes to be successful in this role, we welcome you to apply!



Do you like going from one meeting to another with non-stop action and solving problems every day while managing 8 people? Where you are trying to please clients and juggling tons of competing priorities? If so, this is the job for you.



Brand Managers own the relationships at our agency. It‚Äôs your job to make customers like us while delivering our team‚Äôs accurate non-stop activities.



Responsibilities:

- Manage clients' accounts assigned. The Brand Manager will act as the direct point of contact for the client, responsible for coordinating MAGs services, implementing strategy, communicating with clients, direct reports, and leadership.

- 2+ Direct Reports. In addition to client services, this position is also a managerial position, and following the completion of training, brand managers will be expected to lead a small team of Amazon specialists, who will assist the manager with delivering MAG services to the client.

- Brand managers are the company's backbone, directly responsible for our client accounts.

- Proactively provide a strategy for the account, communicate with the client, and ensure MAG process and deliverables are met.

- Delegate tasks properly to your direct reports and the MAG teams, follow up on delegations, hold staff accountable, and report back to the client.



Qualifications:

- Amazon Expertise: 1+ year with Seller Central (flat files, FBA, PPC, SEO, reinstatements, brand registry, Helium10, keyword research).

- Agency & Management: Experience handling multiple demands, leading teams, hiring, and performance management.

- Project & Client Management: Skilled in multitasking, project management, client communication, and account ownership.

- Tech-Savvy: Comfortable with tools like Zoom, Slack, Asana, and adapting in fast-changing environments.

- Passion for eCommerce: Independent, people-focused, and driven to grow client sales on Amazon.



Expectations:

- Competitive salary!

- Fun Fully Remote Culture ‚Äì Community Culture, Team Oriented Environment

- You can have your OWN Amazon selling business and utilize company resources to build your own account! We love and ? encourage entrepreneurs, in fact, the majority of employees have their own selling accounts!

- Unlimited Learning and Growth ‚Äì If you meet and exceed our core values and grow sales, you will have unlimited opportunities to grow, advance, promote, and earn more.

- 40 hours a week, 8 hours a day

- Permanent WFH setup

- The work schedule is in Eastern Standard Time (Monday to Friday only)

- A dual-monitor setup is required (at least 8GB of RAM)

- Good quality camera and microphone

- Must have at least 25 MBPS internet speed

- Must consistently maintain good performance and seek skills development for professional growth.





------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------





AMAZON BRAND MANAGER INTERN



Want to catapult out of that ‚ÄúWalmart uniform‚Äù and into a world of digital marketing?



We're hiring a Brand Manager Intern at our agency. If you're a tech-savvy gamer who thrives amidst organized chaos, then you are the one that we are looking for!



We will train you how to manage people effectively, communicate better with clients, and navigate tools such as Slack smoothly, while you work at home on your computer. You also get to learn how to sell on Amazon which is the number 1 wealth generation platform in the USA for beginners.



Here's what you'd be doing with us:

- Mastermind core services like PPC, SEO, Design, Catalog merchandising, and troubleshoot like a pro.

- Take charge of at least 8-10 accounts in Seller Central Accounts under a Brand Manager.

- Be the communication bridge between clients and our agency.

- Train and mentor at least 2 AS Intern/BM Intern.



Yes, it's challenging. Yes, it's exciting. Yes, it could be the start of your new career!



We will train you on everything. MAG is an education company and we find it‚Äôs easier to find the right culture fit and then train the skills than the other way around.



We're looking for:

- High Drive

- Friendly Introverts

- Strategic Communication Skills

- Ability to take charge, and follow through on a plan



So what are you waiting for? Toss away that nametag and make the switch today.



Expectations:

- 40 hours a week, 8 hours a day

- You work on your own computer and dual monitors

- Must have at least 25 MBPS internet speed

- Know how to use basic Google Sheets and Excel functions



You‚Äôve got the talent‚Äîwe‚Äôve got the opportunity. Take control of your career and apply now!



For any questions or follow-ups,
 us at

title: Customer Experience & Phone Sales ‚Äì Voice Test Required
description:
Chipcave ‚Äì Poker Chips, Poker Tables & Casino Products



Chipcave sells poker chips, poker tables, playing cards, and other casino-related products to customers across the United States.



We are looking for a trustworthy, detail-oriented, quick-thinking professional who is confident on the phone and calm under pressure.



This role involves:



Handling inbound and outbound phone calls



Managing customer service tickets (phone,
 & live chat)



Updating tracking information



Assisting with order questions and inventory updates



Turning service calls into sales opportunities when appropriate



Working inside Shopify and Gorgias (strongly preferred, but not required)



Chipcave is growing and experiencing increased order volume. As a result, some shipments have been delayed, and many current calls involve customers who are frustrated about delivery timelines.



You must be comfortable handling emotional conversations, de-escalating tense situations, and protecting the customer relationship. Some days are extremely busy, and strong prioritization skills are critical.



This is not a passive customer service position.

You must think quickly, stay composed, and focus on solutions.

title: Recruitment Specialist (High-Volume Talent Matching) ‚Äî Remote
description:
About AI Acquisition



AI Acquisition is the global category leader in AI service-provider enablement. Operating globally, with the US as its primary market, our hybrid Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) and AI marketplace model has achieved explosive growth by solving a critical pain point: connecting AI agencies with qualified enterprise opportunities at scale.

We combine proprietary AI orchestration tools with enterprise-grade SaaS infrastructure, delivering immediate value to agencies and SMBs worldwide.

We‚Äôre transforming how entrepreneurs build life-changing businesses by brokering AI tools to business owners eager to succeed. Positioned at the forefront of the $1.3 trillion AI revolution, we empower members to earn $500+ per hour with streamlined AI-powered systems.

Through our AI Agency Incubator, AI Accelerator, and AI Launchpad, we provide the systems, training, and support needed for rapid success.



Hear from Our Leaders:

Jordan Lee, Co-Founder & Chairman, shares insights about the business: 



Why Join AI Acquisition?



You‚Äôll join a fast-scaling, innovation-driven environment where agility, ownership, and excellence are core values. We operate with the speed of a high-growth company while supporting a global community of agency owners and business leaders who rely on AI-driven systems to scale.



If you want to directly contribute to revenue growth and operate in a performance-driven culture, this is the ideal place for you.



This is not a support role.



This is not admin work.



This is not ticket processing.



This is a specialist operational role at the intersection of payments, revenue protection, risk, and financial operations ‚Äî where your work directly protects revenue, stabilises cashflow, and strengthens platform trust.



If you want to operate in a performance-driven environment where your expertise has real financial impact, this is the role.



This is not just work ‚Äî it‚Äôs a high-trust specialist position inside a fast-scaling AI company.



For People Who Move Fast, Think Faster, and Get Things Done



Let‚Äôs be clear from the start‚Ä¶



This is NOT a slow corporate recruiting role.

This is NOT for people who need constant supervision.

This is NOT for clock-watchers.



This role is for someone early in their recruiting career who is obsessed with execution, hungry to grow, and excited to work inside a high-performance global talent environment.



If you love ticking boxes and waiting for instructions - this will feel uncomfortable.



If you love speed, ownership, and impact - you will grow extremely fast here.





About The Role

We support founders and fast-scaling companies globally by placing top remote talent across operations, sales, tech, and executive support roles.



Your mission is simple:

Find great talent ? qualify fast ? move them forward ? keep pipelines flowing.



This is a high-volume, high-urgency environment where your work directly impacts client success.



No hiding.

No silos.

No bureaucracy.



Just execution.





What You‚Äôll Actually Do (Day-to-Day)

 ‚Ä¢ Source candidates daily across multiple platforms (OnlineJobs, LinkedIn, job boards, talent communities)

 ‚Ä¢ Screen applications with speed without sacrificing quality

 ‚Ä¢ Conduct structured interviews to evaluate communication, reliability, and role fit

 ‚Ä¢ Move qualified candidates through pipelines quickly

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain organized trackers and ATS workflows

 ‚Ä¢ Partner with senior recruiters to hit placement targets

 ‚Ä¢ Keep candidate engagement high to prevent drop-offs

 ‚Ä¢ Spot red flags early ‚Äî and act on them

 ‚Ä¢ Operate with urgency when roles go live



Expect 
ntum. Expect pace. Expect accountability.





Who This Is Perfect For



? 1‚Äì2 years in recruitment, sourcing, screening, or interviewing

? Comfortable speaking with candidates daily

? Highly organized and process-driven

? Strong written and spoken English

? Thrives in structured yet fast environments

? Naturally proactive - you don‚Äôt wait to be told what to do

? Emotionally resilient (recruiting involves rejection and unpredictability)



MOST IMPORTANT:



You take ownership.

You move fast.

You care about doing great work.





Who Should NOT Apply



Please save your time if:

 ‚Ä¢ You prefer fixed, low-output workloads

 ‚Ä¢ You struggle with changing priorities

 ‚Ä¢ You dislike performance expectations

 ‚Ä¢ You need micromanagement

 ‚Ä¢ You are juggling multiple full-time roles



This is a serious opportunity for serious professionals.





What You‚Äôll Gain

 ‚Ä¢ Direct exposure to global hiring

 ‚Ä¢ Learn elite recruiting workflows

 ‚Ä¢ Work with experienced talent leaders

 ‚Ä¢ Rapid career acceleration if you perform

 ‚Ä¢ Real responsibility early

 ‚Ä¢ A team that values execution over politics



High performers grow quickly here.





Working Style



This role requires strong availability and responsiveness during core working hours. (Global Timezone flexibility is required - 9+ working hours/day)



We operate in a collaborative environment where communication speed matters - especially when clients are hiring.



If you are energized by 
ntum, you will love it.





Bonus Points If You Have

 ‚Ä¢ Experience supporting high-volume hiring

 ‚Ä¢ ATS familiarity

 ‚Ä¢ Startup recruiting exposure

 ‚Ä¢ Strong sourcing creativity

 ‚Ä¢ Interview confidence



(Not mandatory - mindset matters more.)





How To Apply (IMPORTANT)



To be considered, start your application with:



‚ÄúHigh Ownership Recruiter‚Äù



Then answer this:



What makes you fast and reliable in recruiting? Give a real example.



Applications that skip this step will NOT be reviewed.



(We care about attention to detail.)





Final Note



We are building a team of people who give a damn, show up with energy, and want to become exceptional at what they do.



If that sounds like you - apply.



If not - this probably isn‚Äôt your environment.

title: SEO Specialist - URGENT! Full Time (US Hours) - Stable and Long Term Job - +PAID VACATION +HOLIDAYS +BONUSES
description:
SEO Specialist Job Description



JSA Interactive is a marketing agency seeking an SEO Specialist with strong technical, analytical, and content optimization skills to support client growth across multiple industries. The role focuses on keyword research aligned with business objectives, optimizing site performance and on-page content, and proactively identifying and resolving technical SEO issues such as broken links, duplicate content, and redirect loops.



You will work closely with our SEO and content team to optimize existing content, improve on-page structure, and ensure SEO best practices are applied across blogs, service pages, and landing pages. The role also requires hands-on WordPress experience, including publishing and optimizing content, managing SEO plugins, and ensuring proper on-page implementation.



At least 1 year of technical and on-page SEO experience is mandatory.



Skills Required:



1. Technical SEO

- Site architecture optimization

- Crawlability and indexing best practices

- Experience with XML sitemaps, and schema markup



2. Analytics & Reporting

- Strong proficiency in Google Analytics and Google Search Console

- Experience with tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs and Screaming Frog

- Ability to analyze keyword performance, CTR, traffic trends, and engagement metrics



3. Keyword Research & Content Strategy

- Understanding of search intent and content relevance

- Experience with keyword research tools (e.g., Keyword Planner, Ubersuggest)

- Content gap analysis and optimization strategies

- Familiarity with content marketing principles



4. On-Page SEO

- Writing and optimizing meta titles and descriptions

- Effective use of heading structure, internal linking, and image alt text

- Conducting content audits and implementing SEO improvements



5. Off-Page SEO & Link Building

- Knowledge of backlink acquisition and outreach strategies

- Ability to evaluate link quality and build natural, authoritative backlinks

- Monitoring and disavowing toxic or low-quality links

- Publishing and optimizing content in WordPress, including blogs, service pages, and landing pages



6. SEO Tools & Platforms

- Google Analytics & Google Search Console

- SEMrush, Ahrefs

- Screaming Frog

- WordPress SEO plugins (Yoast SEO, Rank Math)

- Excel / Google Sheets for data analysis and reporting



We are offering benefits:

- Paid holidays

- Paid vacation

- Performance Bonuses

- Health benefits

- Training

- Sick leave

- Bereavement leave



Job Requirements:

- 50+ mbps internet connection

- Evening hours: 5 PM to 1 AM Manila time

- 2-3 years experience minimum -- looking for 3+ years optimally

- Reference that we can call

- Proof of performance



JSA Interactive Inc. works with clients around the world and is supported by a globally distributed team. Many of our tea
mbers have been with us for over five years, reflecting our focus on long-term relationships and career growth. We actively invest in developing and upskilling our people to create meaningful opportunities for advancement. 



If you believe you meet the requirements for this role, please
 your resume to:
